data.title: The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown
data.meta_description: Our boutique hotel in downtown Chicago enjoys a prime location and features luxurious suites and rooms, on-site dining, and a fitness center.
data.text:
With The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown, you will be steps away from all the business and leisure hot spots in the downtown area. Stroll through the picturesque pavilion at Millennium Park, embark on an artistic journey through trendy River North, and enjoy an unforgettable show at the world-renowned Chicago Theater.

After a busy day of meetings or exploration, unwind in our elegantly appointed suites and rooms boasting all the amenities you need for a comfortable and seamless stay. Plus, enjoy all this while taking in breathtaking views of the river or the city's skyline.

Dine on memorable, locally-sourced cuisine at Hoyts Chicago. Take a step outside and immerse yourself in the picturesque Chicago Riverwalk for a revitalizing jog or keep up with your workout routine in our state-of-the-art fitness facilities.

If business brings you to Chicago, our 16,000 square feet of renovated meeting space offers everything you need to stay productive, connected, and inspired.

We strive to make your stay as comfortable as possible and to accommodate the needs of our guests with disabilities. Please contact the hotel if you have any special requests.

Braille and raised signage are available throughout the hotel to assist guests with visual impairments. We also have a lift to ensure that all guests can easily access all floors of the hotel. We have selected rooms that are designed with accessibility in mind. These rooms feature an accessible bathroom and in-room accessibility. Roll-in showers and grab bars are also available in these rooms for guests who require them. We also provide a wheelchair-accessible path of travel throughout the hotel and designated wheelchair-accessible parking for our guests.

For any questions you might have, please contact us at 312.346.7100.

At The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown, we are proud to offer a wide array of amenities and services designed to make your stay as comfortable and effortless as possible.

Stay Well with Our Fitness Center

Maintain your fitness and well-being at our 24/7 fitness center. Take advantage of the latest cardio and strength training equipment, including a Peloton bike, to elevate your workout. Practice yoga and mindfulness exercises while enjoying the invigorating views of the river.

Market Place

Satisfy your cravings at our convenient Market Place in the lobby. Grab a quick snack on the go. Discover a curated selection of locally-sourced beer, wine, prosecco, and cocktails, like a Chicago Mule and Bees Knees in partnership with Chicago Distilling Company. Try our local collection of Concierge Cocktails in partnership with Bespoke Beverages, such as a Black Cherry & Honey Old Fashioned or a Strawberry Rose Gin & Tonic.

Housekeeping

At The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown, we prioritize your safety and health. Based on our current housekeeping protocol, guests with a stay longer than 7 days will receive a full-service cleaning of their guest room once per week. Additional services can be requested with 24 hours' notice. For additional towels, coffee & tea, and other amenities, please contact the front desk.

Laundry Services

Guests at The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown can take advantage of our convenient dry cleaning and laundry services.

The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown hotel offers valet parking for the below rates:

0-3 hours, $37

3-6 hours, $47

6-overnight, $75

Overnight fee for hotel guests includes three limited in-and-out privileges. Additional in-and-out requests are available for a $20 charge.

We also offer a self-parking option for our guests, located at nearby facilities at 60 E. Lake or 111 E. Wacker. These options include the convenience of unlimited in and out privileges. Upon check-in, guests will receive a QR code that grants a discounted rate at the parking garage. The discounted rate for self-parking is $56 per night.

*Please note, our garage height measurements are 6 3. If your car has cargo storage on top of the hood, it cannot exceed 6 3. Motorcycles are not permitted in the garage. Our valet provider is also unable to provide parking for the following models of cars due to insurance coverage: Dodge Charger, Dodge Challenger, Dodge Durango, Dodge Ram, and Jeep SRT. Self-parking is available at 60 E. Lake or 111 E. Wacker.

Embrace the classic Midwest dining experience at Hoyt's Chicago. With indoor and outdoor spaces, a creative and modern bar program, and a menu filled with flavorful twists on your favorite American dishes, you're in for an unforgettable culinary experience.

Experience the inviting ambiance of our loft-like indoor dining room, designed to make you feel right at home. And during the warmer months, don't miss the opportunity to dine al fresco on our riverfront patio. Enjoy the warm social vibe and one of the finest views in Chicago.

Join us for breakfast, a working business lunch with colleagues, or unwind with friends over dinner, and enjoy our seasonal craft cocktails or a local brew. At Hoyt's American Tavern, youre in for an authentic and welcoming dining experience.

Menus

Breakfast Menu

All Day Menu

Events at Hoyts Chicago

Make your special occasion memorable at Hoyt's! Host up to 50 guests in our private fine dining venue for your next birthday, anniversary, retirement, or any other milestone celebration.

Hours

SundayThursday: 6:30AM11:00PM

Friday & Saturday: 6:30AM12:00AM

Explore Venue Instant Book Venue View Our Catering Menu

Host a memorable event at The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown hotel. Our prime riverfront location in the heart of the Loop district sets the stage for unforgettable meetings and events. Choose from 16,000 square feet of fully renovated, state-of-the-art meeting spaces boasting the latest technology.

Chicago Meeting Rooms and Capacities

Host your next event at our hotel, where 18 modern venues cater to groups of 10 to 350 people. From corporate gatherings to grand weddings and special occasions, our elegant spaces are designed to leave a lasting impression.

Meeting Services and Technology

All conference rooms are equipped with the latest technology to ensure your meeting runs smoothly. From HD video conferencing to custom lighting, our support team can tailor all meeting spaces to your exact needs.

Memorable Food and Drink Menus

Elevate your meeting or event with our Food Is Art approach to catering. Let us craft memorable menus that will energize and excite your entire team, and make sure your event is a memorable one.

Contact Us

The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown is the perfect venue for conferences, training sessions, meetings, and events of all sizes. Request a proposal for your next event or meeting.

Say "I do" to a lifetime of memories at The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown. With over 10,000 square feet of spectacular Chicago wedding venues, Sonesta has everything you need to make your special day one to remember. From the glamorous 39th Floor Penthouse Ballroom with breathtaking views of the Windy City skyline, to the stunning outdoor terrace event space, we offer a variety of options for your dream ceremony or reception.

But it's not just the venues that make us special - our dedicated team of Chicago wedding experts has years of experience and local vendor knowledge to ensure that every detail of your special day is taken care of.

Explore Venues

Contact Us

Ready to plan your wedding celebration? Connect with Mark Johnson at mark.johnson@sonesta.com.

Penthouse Ballroom

You simply cant enjoy a better view of the Chicago River and the cityscape than from our Penthouse Ballroom on the 39th floor. Floor-to-ceiling windows, innovative lighting, and an open, airy feel give the space an elegance all its own. This gorgeous room served as Bruce Waynes penthouse in The Dark Knight. A pre-function space is located adjacent and can be combined with the Ballroom to enlarge your event space.

Penthouse Terrace

Exchange your vows and swear your eternal love 39 floors above Chicago! Or begin your reception with drinks on the terrace before heading inside to continue to celebrations in the Penthouse Ballroom. Urban sophistication takes center stage in this unforgettable sky-high setting.

Grand Ballroom

Have the grandest wedding and the grandest party in our largest space. This vast and sophisticated space on the sixth floor provides ample room for all your friend and family. Pre-function spaces are located adjacent and can be combined with the Ballroom to enlarge your event space.

1. Does your hotel in Downtown Chicago have a pool?

No, our hotel does not feature a swimming pool.

2. When is check-in/checkout time at The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown hotel? Do you offer early check-in or late checkout?

Guests can check in to the hotel starting at 4:00 PM and must check out by 11:00 AM. While it is possible to request an early check-in or late check-out, it is not guaranteed to be granted.

3. Do your rooms have kitchenettes with microwaves?

The rooms at The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown do not have kitchenettes with microwaves.

4. Does The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown have a restaurant on-site?

The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown hotel has a restaurant called Hoyt's American Tavern, which serves traditional Midwest-style food.

5. Do you offer a shuttle service from the airport to The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown?

We do not offer shuttle services to or from the airport.

6. Do you offer onsite parking? Is it included in my room rate?

The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown hotel offers valet parking for the below rates:

0-3 hours, $37

3-6 hours, $47

6-overnight, $75

Overnight fee for hotel guests includes three limited in-and-out privileges. Additional in-and-out requests are available for a $20 charge.

We also offer a self-parking option for our guests, located at nearby facilities at 60 E. Lake or 111 E. Wacker. These options include the convenience of unlimited in and out privileges. Upon check-in, guests will receive a QR code that grants a discounted rate at the parking garage. The discounted rate for self-parking is $58 per night at 111 E. Wacker and $53 per night at 60 E Lake.

Please note, our garage height measurements are 63. If your car has cargo storage on top of the hood it cannot exceed 63. Motorcycles are not permitted in the garage. Our valet provider is also unable to provide parking for the following models of cars due to insurance coverage: Dodge Charger, Dodge Challenger, Dodge Durango, Dodge Ram and Jeep SRT. Self-parking is available at 60 E. Lake or 111 E. Wacker.

7. Do you offer room service? What are the hours?

The hotel does not offer room service. If you are interested in having food delivered to your room from Hoyts American Tavern or other local restaurants, the front desk staff can provide assistance.

8. Do you have an on-site laundry service?

During your stay, you can utilize our dry cleaning and laundry services for your convenience.

9. Is The Royal Sonesta a pet-friendly hotel in Downtown Chicago?

Yes, The Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown is a pet-friendly hotel.
